title: ML Model Specification
description: Schema for GPU Agent ML model specification data

name.description: Unique identifier slug for the model (URL-friendly)

label.description: Human-readable display name of the model

modelType.description: Category of model for display purposes

useCase.description: Primary use cases for the model

creator.description: Organization and people who created the model

organization.description: Company or organization that developed the model

people.description: Key individuals who developed the model

gpuMemoryRequirementGB.description: GPU memory requirement in GB for default parameter size (FP16 inference)

quantizationVersions.description: Common quantization versions with GPU memory requirements

memoryRequirementGB.description: GPU memory requirement in GB for this quantization

notes.description: Additional notes about this quantization version

releaseDate.description: Release date of the model (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format)

license.description: License under which the model is released

evaluationBenchmarks.description: Benchmarks used to evaluate the model

contextLength.description: Context window length in tokens (for LLMs)

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when this data was last updated (e.g., '2025-12-04T10:30:00Z')

references.description: URLs to reference documentation and specs

notes.description: Additional notes about data choices and conflicting information resolution
